body:
I like this because the number is Dylan Klebold’s birthday. I’m sorry Dylan, I hope you’re happy up there, and those 6 you killed are happy too. I hope you’re having fun with Rocky and Lucy. 1981-1999

Fuck Eric Tho, I hope he burns in hell hes a piece of shit.
your parents will literally eat bread within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 0 other manga. Sorry y'all i got cursed too, you can't understimate random people curse
